author: KEXP
description:
http://KEXP.ORG presents Chinese American Bear performing live in the KEXP studio. Recorded September 23, 2024.

Songs:
Kids Go Down  (孩子们的时光) 00:34
Feelin’ Fuzzy (毛绒绒的感觉) 06:04
Take Me To Beijing (一起回北京) 09:52
Love Bus (爱​的​大​巴) 13:30

Lingbo Anne Tong - Vocals
Bryce Barsten - Guitar, Keyboard, Vocals
Bryan Coats - Drums
Trevor Spencer - Bass, Keyboard
Jack Knight - Guitar, Keyboard, Percussion
Li Chen - Dancer

Host: Diana Ratsamee
Audio Engineer: Julian Martlew
Audio Mixer:  Bryce Barsten, Trevor Spencer
Mastering Engineer: Matt Ogaz

Cameras: Jim Beckmann, Carlos Cruz, Scott Holpainen & Luke Knecht 
Editor: Jim Beckmann

https://chineseamericanbear.com
http://kexp.org

Join this channel to get access to perks:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3I2GFN_F8WudD_2jUZbojA/join
title: Chinese American Bear - Full Performance (Live on KEXP)
